short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to help be Simply Focused on you current work and prevent visiting distracting web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SimplyFocused is your go-to tool for staying productive in todayâ€™s distraction-filled digital world. 

With this easy-to-use extension, you can block specific websites that tend to interrupt your workflow, helping you stay on task. Simply create a custom list of URLs you want to avoid, and let SimplyFocused keep you distraction-free during your most productive hours.

In addition to blocking distractions, the extension sends you motivational messages to keep you energized and focused on your goals. Whether you're a student, professional, or anyone aiming to boost productivity, SimplyFocused helps you stay on track and get more done effortlessly.

ðŸ¥‡Key Features of SimplyFocused:

1. Customizable website blocking and ensuring distractions are minimized.

2. Scheduled focus times (hours, minutes, days of week).

3. Motivational messages to stay focused and maintain productivity.

4. Flexible blocking options without complex settings.

5. User-Friendly interface and intuitive design .

Update notes:
- URL link / web page name appears in the Add new URL field automatically when opened
- synced reload the page with changes in the popup window
